markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Disrupt Prey](/Feats.aspx?ID=501) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 172 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
Your hunted prey is within your reach, and it uses a manipulate action, uses a move action, or leaves a square during a move action it’s using.

</column>

---

Make a melee Strike against your prey. If the attack is a critical hit, you disrupt the triggering action.
name: Disrupt Prey
